Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Seal
Description: Small conical seal with a rectangular base. All surfaces were polished. The flat is carved with a geometrical motif featuring a criss-crossed and hatched rectangle. Once the ring had broken, both surfaces were grooved to allow for its suspension. The seal was never used again, except maybe as a counterweight.
